#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int a[1001] = {0};
int main() {
	int n, temp;
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>n;
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
		cin>>temp;
		a[temp]++;
	}
	int max = 0, index;
	for(int i = 0; i < 1002; i++){
		if(a[i] > max){
			max = a[i];
			index = i;
		}
	}
	cout<<index<<endl;
	cout<<max<<endl;
	return 0;
}
